pull.title: cirrus: Run extended test feature_pruning
pull.body:
Currently not run in this repo, but in https://cirrus-ci.com/github/MarcoFalke/bitcoin

https://cirrus-ci.com/github/MarcoFalke/bitcoin/1903-ciExt

events.body:
utACK 394fc4d

Looks like the last full run on a FreeBSD VM (of master) completed successfully.

verification.payload:
tree b9b8196c9401adcb721985bbcf63fced90289920
parent b1344eac5fcccd1847438ca203ce625f30d1151d
author MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1551655103 -0500
committer MarcoFalke <falke.marco@gmail.com> 1561056756 -0400

ci: Run extended tests

events.body: I had to exclude feature_dbcrash, but at least we are running feature_pruning on freebsd now and the build is faster. Going to merge this.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -2,15 +2,16 @@ task:
   name: "FreeBsd 12.0 amd64  [GOAL: install]  [no depends, only system libs]"
   freebsd_instance:
     image: freebsd-12-0-release-amd64
-  ccache_cache:
-    folder: "/tmp/ccache_dir"
   env:
     MAKEJOBS: "-j3"
     CONFIGURE_OPTS: "--disable-dependency-tracking"
     GOAL: "install"
     CCACHE_SIZE: "200M"
     CCACHE_COMPRESS: 1
     CCACHE_DIR: "/tmp/ccache_dir"
+  ccache_cache:
+    folder: "/tmp/ccache_dir"
+  timeout_in: 80m
comments.body:
If you are hitting the time out limit but your build can benefit from more CPUs, you can try to increase VM resources to the maximum allowed:

```yaml
freebsd_instance:
    image: freebsd-12-0-release-amd64
    cpu: 8
    memory: 24G
```
